channel.title: About Open Ireland Network on Open Ireland Network
channel.description: Recent content in About Open Ireland Network on Open Ireland Network

item.title: Community Code of Conduct
item.description:
Our Pledge

We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

item.title: Contact Open Ireland Network
item.description: “Open Ireland Network is a not-for-profit organisation that supports the growing community of organisations and individuals across the island of Ireland who are passionate about all things open.”

item.title: Who Can Join Open Ireland Network?
item.description:
Join the Open Ireland Network Community

We invite individuals and organisations across Ireland who are passionate about open collaboration to connect with us.
